qTox: A New Kind of Instant Messaging: qTox: Secret messagin' bottles for the crew
A New Kind of Instant Messaging: Secret messagin' bottles for the crew.
sect1_description: Now that the King be eyein' us all, qTox is a simple method o' pipsquawkin' so's you can have a gar with the lads, without any suspicious sort o' peepin' by spies.
download_warning: Nightlies aren't for the weak of heart, you may encounter bugs, crashes, and large doses of frustration. You've been warned!
sect2_aboutbody:
qTox is constructed so's you can keep up with yer mates 'n' close ones, without havin' any sort o' privacy violations.
 While other shipmakers are beggin' a pretty pence for their services, qTox is free both gold-wise, and as in runnin'-free freedom.
 That is, yer free to do whatever you wish like with qTox.
Instant messaging, video conferencing, a: Speedy letterin', view-talkin' with all yer mates, and plenty a more
sect3_messages_blurb: No sort o' drink in these, laddies, but they be the best of the secure communicatin' these days.
sect3_voice_blurb: Keep track of yer crew, with free long-talkin's to all yer mates.
sect3_video_blurb: I know not what manner o' witch they done tricked into givin' up her secrets, but they done did it.
sect4_security_blurb:
qTox be's solemnly meditatin' on yer securin'.
With Royal-Quality encryption, you can sleep easy knowin' that the only lads eyein' yer messages are the ones you send them off at.
sect4_easy_blurb: Not like other methods o' secure messagin', qTox don't necessitate learnin' all sort o' witchcraft and witchery to use it. qTox comes fresh out o' the shipyard with simple-like workin' board, so you can be focusin' on your conversations.
sect4_freedom_blurb: qTox is both free for you to make a use of, and free for you to change. Yer completely free to both use and modify qTox to yer needins. And tackin' on, qTox will never harass you an' yer crew with adverrrtisements, or require you to pay up for features.
We're cool folks from <span class=\"text: We're cool guys from all around the seas.
sect5_github: Want to pitch in? We're on GitHub. No voodoo wizardin' experience is necessitated.
sect6_mailinglist: Keep yer scurvy crew up ta' date!
sect6_githubtoirc: Start yer own project and ask us on GitHub, or in the IRC!
donate_about: To see how you can help out by donating, please visit our donations page. Thank you!
